getLeaderboards

public static void getLeaderboards(AGResponseCallback<GetLeaderboardsResponse> callback,
                                   java.lang.Object... userData)
Request all leaderboards for this game. The passed callback will be called when the operation is complete. This is an asynchronous operation.

Parameters:
callback - Callback to call when the operation is complete.
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.

getLeaderboards

public static AGResponseHandle<GetLeaderboardsResponse> getLeaderboards(java.lang.Object... userData)
Request all leaderboards for this game. Returns a handle to poll for completion. This is an asynchronous operation.

Parameters:
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.
Returns:
Returns a handle to poll for operation completion.

getScores

public static void getScores(java.lang.String leaderboardId,
                             com.amazon.ags.constants.LeaderboardFilter filter,
                             AGResponseCallback<GetScoresResponse> callback,
                             java.lang.Object... userData)

Parameters:
leaderboardId - Leaderboard ID to get scores from.
filter - Filter to apply to the request.
callback - Callback to call when the operation is complete.
userData - Optional user data. Delivered to the user as an array of objects.
